Name: Offering Table of Amunirdis
Description: The offering table of Amunirdis is a rectangular table framed by a frieze of inscription. It is in the form of the Hetep sign, the traditional form for offering tables. The table is decorated with pictures in relief of the offerings that will be placed upon the table. It is very well preserved but two hieroglyphic signs are missing. Its base is not rectangular like the table. The sides of the table are leaning outwards.
